At about a ninth of its cost, and a high average rating, you'd believe this is worth it. Well it's not. I ordered a size 10 (UK), and my toes had some headroom to spare. Your mileage might very, but I'd rather buy the Adidas Superstar if it's ever on sale or if I feel like splurging five grand. Not this one.
